title: [Large-scale] Generative AI-Based Language Education Instructional Design Workshop: Enhancing Text-Based Learning Design Competencies and Integrated Expression/Reading Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design knowledge, basic generative AI concepts, core language teaching vocabulary/grammar, basic business writing/reading comprehension
context.additional_context: Strengthening generative AI tool utilization competencies for workplace language education course design. Special focus is placed on improving effective expression, writing, and reading comprehension skills in business contexts, emphasizing vocabulary expansion and contextual usage strategies through text analysis.

learning_goals: Evaluate the applicability of generative AI in language education using the SWOT analysis framework, analyzing cultural appropriateness and pedagogical effectiveness of text-based learning activities.

Learners design three or more draft language education course maps using generative AI tools like ChatGPT, present ten or more learning activity examples applying text generation functions (summarization/paraphrasing) and vocabulary expansion strategies (synonym substitution/contextual usage), emphasizing integrated writing/reading activities in business contexts.

Propose verification and improvement plans for generative AI content, evaluating grammatical accuracy and cultural appropriateness, and establish feedback strategies to enhance lexical diversity and expressiveness in AI-generated texts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
